content: squiddly cat toy by gnathalie2 materials ww yarn i used lion brand cotton-ease size f hook pattern rd1 5 single_crochet in a ring rd2 2sc in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet rd3 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd6 slip_stitch in next single_crochet chain 18 then slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and in each of next 16 chs rd7 slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet chain 18-25 shorter or longer if you want sl st in 2nd chain from hook and each chain up slip_stitch in next single_crochet repeat rd6 & rd7 all the way around then slip_stitch in last/first and fasten off attach yarn to the top of the toy chain 99 fasten_off i made a loop by tying a knot at the end so it would be easier to hold and dangle in front of the cats enjoy
